title: Help identifying this script font
content:
Would someone be able to tell me what this script font is please? Thanks in advance!

[http://store.hypebeast.com/files/2012/08/DELUXE-x-Hanes-Crew-Neck-Tee-Package.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415140226/http:/store.hypebeast.com/files/2012/08/DELUXE-x-Hanes-Crew-Neck-Tee-Package.jpg)
author: unvanished

comments.content: Sorry, to clarify, I would like to identify the font that reads "All-American Comfort". Thanks again!
